text: Another build error, what occours with libiconv? Trying to build mplayer SVN under DragonFly: http://sh.nu/p/3278
Anyone having the same error under NetBSD too?
Why libiconv is so fscking faulty? :P
doesn't look like a libiconv issue
the linker just can't find the right libs
Someone said me "link it explicitly against -liconv or force /usr/include before /usr/pkg/include in the search path"
first you have to make sure you pick the right libiconv
there's iconv in netbsd base and in pkgsrc too
so you'd have to check the config logs to see which iconf was configured
and then give the right path for the linker
